Hi there! Thanks for reaching out. Currently, NewsBreak supports video ads up to 1 minute in length. For any feature requests like extending video duration or setting a campaign lifetime budget, I recommend emailing our support team at adsupport@newsbreak.com with your account details and request specifics.
